scripts.tf:plan: pnpm run wg:build && cd ../terraform/api && terraform plan
scripts.tf:deploy: pnpm run wg:build && cd ../terraform/api && terraform apply
scripts.db:schema: powershell -Command "Push-Location ../terraform/api; $DB_NAME = (terraform output -raw d1_database_name); Pop-Location; pnpm wrangler d1 execute $DB_NAME --remote --file=schema.sql"
scripts.deploy:init: pnpm run tf:deploy && pnpm run wg:deploy && pnpm run db:schema && pnpm run deploy
